thread.section_title: Hotel Le Marcel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: nice hotel
thread.title_full: nice hotel - Review of Hotel Le Marcel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Milton D
title: nice hotel
text: not a lot to say. It's a clean, comfortable, well situated hotel run by competent people. I have stayed in a room once on the second floor where the street noise interfered with sleep.The only other negative for those of us coming from N. Amer. is that we arrive in the morning and are kept out of the rooms until 15:00. But everything considered, it's a good value hotel.
